wiki.powers: Vanisher is a mutant with the ability to teleport himself and others over an undisclosed amount of space.
wiki.bio_text: Vanisher worked for [[Apocalypse (Age of Apocalypse)|Apocalypse]]. He was ordered by Apocalypse to transport a large battalion of [[Infinites (Age of Apocalypse)|Infinites]] to an undisclosed graveyard where [[Magneto (Age of Apocalypse)|Magneto]] was at. During the brief confrontation that followed it was discovered that Magneto and Vanisher had previously met. Vanisher fulfilled his duty and teleported away before Magneto could attack him.
wiki.bio:
Vanisher worked for [[Apocalypse (Age of Apocalypse)|Apocalypse]]. He was ordered by Apocalypse to transport a large battalion of [[Infinites (Age of Apocalypse)|Infinites]] to an undisclosed graveyard where [[Magneto (Age of Apocalypse)|Magneto]] was at. During the brief confrontation that followed it was discovered that Magneto and Vanisher had previously met. Vanisher fulfilled his duty and teleported away before Magneto could attack him. 

Having completed his task Apocalypse then ordered the Vanisher to search for [[Lensherr, Charles (Age of Apocalypse)|Magneto's son]]. However when Vanisher discovered Charles location he encountered his [[Nanny (Age of Apocalypse)|Nanny]], who proceeded to kill the Vanisher in order to protect Charles.
